body:
Hi! Im MisteryCAB
i really like avic.us... so i would like to be a mod!
I can speak English perfectly.. and i can also speak spanish! because im from Argentina <3
I think it might be a good moderator because it could understand what the people who speak Spanish says!...
I'm not very active because I had a problem with internet..but now I already solved the problem and I can play avic.us every day!
I play minecraft for 3 years and I consider myself a very good fighter (in PVP )
Also ... I have a channel with 250 subs ... and those subs could enter the server and be active members of the community :) [ www.youtube.com/Theneocraft1 ]
I was a mod of many servers, so now I know how to make this work!
                                                            [Personal Information]
Name: MisteryCAB (Gabriel Ramos)
Age:now I have fifteen (15) years
Interest:Minecraft and youtube
Playtime: like 8 hours (or more) every day...
languages:English And Spanish

replies.body:

Make sure to stay updated on the forums to check for the official release date and requirements.

Best of luck to you!

replies.body:
Applications are currently closed, but you can apply here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3 once they re-open.

Good luck with your application!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Another thing, players aren't ranked to Jr. Moderator based on PvP skill.
Just make sure that you have a good application and are confident speaking, and you will do just fine.

replies.body:
Pre-warning:

I can personally tell you that it's a bit tense. You won't be enjoying the game is much. You have to be hard-working and patient.

But you seem quite passionate about it, so I guess you'll do really well :)

replies.body:
Good luck in the future. I'm looking forward applying too. (By the way, my stats don't say anything,  I joined waaaaay before this summer, they just reset :/) Anyway, I'll try to look into my infractions, I think I need to control are myself a bit before applying.  
Also, you should know that applications are not open right now, and some people already told you above. Whilst applying make sure you don't lie and such, that will most likely not help you.
My main language is also Spanish, so nice to meet someone that speaks the same language as me. c:

My main language is also Spanish, so nice to meet someone that speaks the same language as me. c:
